resources.string: An app for downloading, storing, and nicely displaying dining hall menus at Princeton University.
Brian Tu, David Zhao\nBrian Tu\nDavid Zhao
Click and drag location names to reorder them
Thanks for downloading PMeals! Here are some tips to help you use the app.
• Swipe left and right to view additional menus.
• Tap on a dining hall\'s name to view an entire day\'s menu.
• Each menu item will have anywhere from 0 to 3 bars on its right side. Here\'s what they mean:
• Tap on the date to toggle between simple and detailed dates.
